prompt:
Image Prompt:
Create an image depicting a serene garden bathed in soft, ethereal light, with a prominent tree at the center. On one side of the tree, show lush, vibrant fruits symbolizing goodness and life. On the other side, depict dark, twisted roots emerging from the ground, representing the concept of evil. Above the tree, suggest a divine presence or heavenly light shining down, illustrating the contrast between light and darkness, good and evil in a biblical context. The overall tone should convey a sense of contemplation and spiritual reflection.
